sponsor: Fujifilm Kyowa Kirin Biologics Co., Ltd.
briefTitle: A Study to Compare FKB327 Efficacy and Safety With Humira® in Rheumatoid Arthritis Patients
officialTitle: A Randomised, Blinded, Active-Controlled Study to Compare FKB327 Efficacy and Safety With the Comparator Humira® in Rheumatoid Arthritis Patients Inadequately Controlled on Methotrexate
summary: The purpose of the study is to compare the effectiveness and safety of FKB327 in comparison to Humira® in rheumatoid arthritis patients who have inadequate disease control on methotrexate.

primaryOutcome.measure: American College of Rheumatology (ACR) 20 Response Rate
